titles.title: Property Owners Protection Act of 1999

To amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to prohibit the use under that Act of any item or information obtained by trespassing on privately owned property, or otherwise taken from privately owned property without the consent of the owner of the property.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to Department of the Interior for comments.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 6/17/1999--Introduced. Property Owners Protection Act of 1999 - Amends the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to prohibit any item or information obtained by trespassing on privately owned property or otherwise taken from privately owned property without the owner's consent from: (1) being admissible as evidence in any criminal, civil, or administrative proceeding under such Act; and (2) otherwise being used to administer such Act.
